text:
Message 3176 of 4024
Please use OFW for communications.
I did not tell Adrian about the schedule and potential conflicts - That is an untrue statement.
I told Adrain there was try outs tonight. He asked if I had paid, I said yes for try outs only.
Stated he did not want to do it.
I asked if you had spoken to him about participating in the league. He said no. I said, I thought he wanted to and had discussed with you. If there was
a miscommunication, to connect with you directly.
Yes - Agree to engage lawyers on this one.
So, AD said you spoke to him and let him know he would be gone for the summer. I think I will take issue with your assertion of 100% parental
control. Please don't go after him again like you did last time because of what he said to me.
We don't need to argue. This one is clearly for the lawyers.
Sent:06/14/2024 at 04:04 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 06/14/2024 at 04:05 PM)
Subject:Local Hoops - Adrian desire not to do it
Message 3177 of 4024
Are you copy and pasting words between platforms?
Sent:06/14/2024 at 04:06 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/14/2024 at 04:29 PM)
Subject:Re: Local Hoops - Adrian desire not to do it
Message 3178 of 4024
So you don’t need my approval for anything this summer. Duly noted. I’ll disengage on further actions.
Sent:06/14/2024 at 04:07 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 06/14/2024 at 04:33 PM)
Subject:Re: summer schedule
Message 3179 of 4024
Yes as you refuse to use OFW.
Confirming Adrian will not be attending try outs tonight.
Sent:06/14/2024 at 04:33 PM

Subject:Re: Local Hoops - Adrian desire not to do it
